get.summary: Returns a list of ZapApp Applications under your account

post.summary: Adds a new Application to the Zapappi subscription

get.summary: Returns a specific Application based on the Id

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription id the application is attached too

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: Is the application enabled (call it be used to termiante calls)

parameters.name: scriptBody
parameters.description: The script used to process the call

parameters.name: scriptUrl
parameters.description: The Url of your script (if set, ScriptBody won't be used)

get.summary: Returns a list of media files attached to this Application

delete.summary: Deletes a media file attached to this Application

post.summary: Creates a new outbound call request for this Application

get.summary: Returns a list of Application Resources associated with the given Application

post.summary: Adds an Application Resource to the given Application

delete.summary: Deletes an Application Resource from the given Application

get.summary: Gets a list of SIP Provider Accounts connected to your ZapApp platform
Returns call records for the given application
Returns all the Key Value Pairs for a given Application

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of item to skip over

Returns a list of domains associated with your services

parameters.name: endpointType
parameters.description: The endpoint type that daa should be sent to

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Data for the endpoint type (E.g. Url or EMail Address)

parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Number of item to skip over

parameters.description: List of numbers to add to the Port Request
